name: Reckless Recycling
description:
Bin types:
Orange - metal

Turquoise - paper

Green - glass

Controls:

Up W Left A Down S Right D Pick up item E Throw item F (hold!) Dash Shift Minigames interaction Space

Reckless Recycling is a fast-paced recycling simulation game brimming with chaos and minigames to boot.

KNOWN ISSUES:

The current build does not contain sound effects.

Please fill out this feedback form to help us make the game better: https://forms.gle/nzHU5HhKPifp4EuR8

Credits:

Cas Witor - Lead developer and programmer, 3D character artist

Kay Cleghorn - 3D prop and environment artist

Archie Bower - UI Art

Ben Motyer - Sound and music
